ygData.subject: telescoping lens & pole
ygData.msgSnippet: how do you know he s telling the truth? there are a lot of BS artists out there. did you actually see these items? and he may have refused to share the recipe
ygData.messageBody:
how do you know he's telling the truth? there are a lot of BS artists out
there. did you actually see these items? and he may have refused to share
the recipe because he didn't know it. i'll believe it when i see it...

Xiltik
E'Ci

>Well, I have good news and bad news. The good news is the Telescope Lens
and
> Collapsable Fishing Pole CAN be made. And, you DO have to use a
collapsable
>fishing pole to make the telescope. Both of these items are makeable.
>
>Now for the bad news. The only person I know that can make them WILL NOT
share
>the recipe! Can you believe that? He is a gnome on Xegony by the name of
>Salvadori, so if you can pry the recipe from him, good luck. I tried.
Well, also, he
>said that Tinkering skill improvement had been fixed, and he was up in the
60's on
>skill. So keep tinkering.
>
>Xalastile
>Level 22 Magician
>Xegony
